name: Grizzbook
0:
”Alexa, ask Grizzbook what events are happening today”
”Alexa, ask Grizzbook what the events are next week”
”Tell me about event one”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grizz book
des: This scours all of Oakland University's events and gives details on what's going on any given day. You can search by day, or even find out what's happening next week. Asking for more information about a given event will give you a brief description of the event if a student has given one.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
